description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Supplier_RefundObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

validation.validation: Specify Supplier Invoice Document that are approved and not fully paid. This document can't be applied [SID].
Specify Supplier Invoice Document reference.
The company, supplier and currency on all supplier invoice documents must match the supplier refund header. The values on this document don't match the supplier refund [SID].
Specify a supplier invoice adjustment. This invoice document is not supported [SID].
Specify supplier invoice documents that aren't already in use on another transaction. This document is used on another transaction: [SID].
Specify a supplier invoice document that has a negative total amount. You can't use this invoice document [SID].
Specify a supplier invoice document that doesn't use VAT on payment or Withholding tax set to payment realization. You can't use this invoice document [SID].
Specify a supplier invoice document that has a Matched status. You can't use this invoice document [SID].

Specify a supplier invoice document that doesn't have lines that include grant worktags associated with a cost reimbursable, fixed amount, or prepaid award line type. You can't use this invoice document [SID].
